title: Influencer Marketing Manager
job_overview:
We’re growing fast — and we’re hiring an Influencer Marketing Manager who can move with us, help scale our streetwear brand authentically, and deliver results.

Responsibilities:

Daily outreach and relationship-building with influencers and creators.
Scout and identify fresh, culturally relevant talent that aligns with our streetwear aesthetic.
Manage influencer partnerships end-to-end, including negotiation and briefing.
Track performance metrics (reach, engagement, conversions) and optimize campaigns.
Work closely with internal teams to analyze results and stay organized.

Requirements:

2+ years of influencer marketing experience, preferably in fashion/streetwear.
Strong communication, negotiation, and relationship-building skills.
Highly organized and data-driven, with attention to performance metrics.
Deep understanding of youth culture, streetwear trends, and influencer ecosystems.
Proactive, resourceful, and able to bring influencer suggestions and campaign ideas quickly.


What We Offer:

Competitive pay.
Creative freedom and meaningful impact on a scaling brand.
Access to exclusive drops and collaborations.
Clear growth opportunities in a dynamic, fast-paced environment.

What we’re looking:

Proven track record of influencer campaigns (show us your results!).
An existing network or a clear plan to quickly source relevant influencers.
Strong cultural awareness and trend-spotting ability.
Analytical and results-oriented mindset.

How to Apply:

Include the word “BREAD” in your application so we know you’re paying attention.

Question to applicant:

If you joined our team tomorrow, how would you approach finding and selecting influencers for our streetwear brand in your first 30 days? Please describe the criteria you would use to evaluate them and how you would ensure they’re a good fit for both our audience and brand culture.

Only experienced candidates will be considered.
